name: mvc
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: npm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && c8 node --test -r ts-node/register "test/**/*.ts"
scripts.start: npm run tailwind && npm run build:ts && npm run open-api && fastify start -l info -p 4343 dist/app.js --options
scripts.dev: npm run tailwind:dev & npm run build:ts && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "npm:watch:ts" "npm:dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: npm run open-api && fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -p 4343 -d -I 9320 -P dist/app.js --options
